EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Agenda Now Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriCON2012_Agenda_Public_07192012.xlsx>
TriCON is the place to be: Expert presentations, new product introductions, in-depth training and sunny San Diego. Get ready to connect, engage, and learn. View the online agenda to discover the keynote speakers, presentations, and social events available to you. Click here <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriCON2012_Agenda_Public_07192012.xlsx> to download your special preview. <http://www.tritech.com/tricon>
